TunableList.name: ALL_DEGREES
TunableList.description: A list of all available degrees that will be available in all university.

TunableList.name: ALL_UNIVERSITIES
TunableList.description: A list of all available universities in the game.

TunableTuple.name: COURSE_ELECTIVES
TunableTuple.description: Tuning structure holding all electives data.

Tunable.name: elective_change_frequency
Tunable.description: The frequency, in Sim days, at which the electives option will regenerate.

TunableTuple.name: elective_count
TunableTuple.description: The number of elective courses to choose for enrollment from the elective list. Random number will be chosen from the interval.

Tunable.name: lower_bound
Tunable.description: The lower bound of the interval.

Tunable.name: upper_bound
Tunable.description: The upper bound of the interval.

TunableList.name: electives
TunableList.description: A list of weighted elective courses that will be available in all university.

TunableTuple.name: weight
TunableTuple.description: The weight of this elective relative to other electives in this list.

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

TunableList.name: PROFESSOR_ARCHETYPES
TunableList.description: A mapping of school to professor archetypes so that we can get professors with the correct skill set for the college they will be teaching at.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The university that the professor archetype will belong to.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: A list of Sim Filters used to find sims that match a certain archetype and make them a professor by giving them the correct trait.

Tunable.description: A single Sim filter defining a professor archetype to search for. A search will be run using this filter as the archetype when creating a professor and if no Sims match or can be conformed to this filter then a new Sim will be created using the tuned Sim Template.

TunableList.name: SKILL_TO_MAJOR_TUNING
TunableList.description: A mapping of Skill -> Majors that we can use to determine what the appropriate major is for an existing Sim. Each Skill can be mapped to a list of Majors. If more than one is specified then a random major will be chosen if the Sim is being assigned a major based on that skill.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The skill being used to assign the major.

TunableList.name: value
TunableList.description: The set of majors to choose from when assigning a major based on the associated skill type. If this has more than one entry then one of the majors will be chosen at random.

Tunable.description: The university major to enroll the Sim in.
